name: AVAC (AIDS VACCINE AND ADVOCACY COALITION)
description: AVAC works to ensure ethical development of and access to effective HIV prevention options
sampleDescriptions: Advocate for inclusion of funding and report language to resource and direct CDC to develop and launch a national PrEP program to provide PrEP (HIV prevention medication) to people in need nationwide
